# cmccloudv2_security_group (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get security_group by id
data "cmccloudv2_security_group" "security_group_1" {
    security_group_id = "3ac75ff6-9744-4cc1-a21c-3bd4d6154bcb"
}

# get security_group by name
data "cmccloudv2_security_group" "security_group_2" {
    name = "sg-9wjd"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `description` (String) Filter by name of ecsgroup (case-insenitive)
- `name` (String) Filter by name of ecsgroup, match exactly (case-insenitive)
- `security_group_id` (String) Id of the ecsgroup

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
